entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
